_examples.MICRODATA:
Software Engineer
  
    Location: 
    Kirkland WA
  
  Industry: Computer Software
  Occupational Category: 15-1132.00 Software Developers, Application
  Hours: Full-time, 40 hours per week
  Salary: USD 100000
  
  
    Description: ABC Company Inc.
    seeks a full-time mid-level software engineer to develop in-house tools.
  
  Responsibilities:
  
    Design and write specifications for tools for in-house customers
    Build tools according to specifications
  
  Educational requirements:
  
    Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or related fields of study.
  
  Experience requirements:
  
   Minumum 3 years experience as a software engineer
  
  Desired Skills:
  
    Web application development using Java/J2EE
    Web application development using Python or familiarity with dynamic programming languages
  
  Qualifications:
  
    Ability to work in a team environment with members of varying skill levels.
    Highly motivated.
    Learns quickly.
  
  Benefits:
    ABC Corp provides top-tier employee compensation benefits and a relaxed, team-oriented work environment, including: Medical, Life, Dental
    
      Incentives:
        Performance-based annual bonus plan, project-completion bonuses
      
  If interested in this position, please email us your resume, along with salary requirements and a cover letter to Jobs@abc.123.
  Date Posted: 2011-10-31

_properties.rdfs:comment: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.
_properties.rdfs:label: baseSalary

_properties.rdfs:comment: Publication date for the job posting.
_properties.rdfs:label: datePosted

_properties.descriptionZh: 该职位所需的教育背景。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Educational background needed for the position.
_properties.rdfs:label: educationRequirements

_properties.descriptionZh: 就业类型（例如全职，兼职，合同，临时，季节性，实习）。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).
_properties.rdfs:label: employmentType

_properties.descriptionZh: 职位所需的技能和经验的描述。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.
_properties.rdfs:label: experienceRequirements

_properties.rdfs:comment: Organization offering the job position.
_properties.rdfs:label: hiringOrganization

_properties.rdfs:comment: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.
_properties.rdfs:label: incentiveCompensation

_properties.rdfs:comment: The industry associated with the job position.
_properties.rdfs:label: industry

_properties.rdfs:comment: Description of benefits associated with the job.
_properties.rdfs:label: jobBenefits

_properties.rdfs:comment: A (typically single) geographic location associated with the job position.
_properties.rdfs:label: jobLocation

_properties.rdfs:comment: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.
_properties.rdfs:label: occupationalCategory

_properties.descriptionZh: 此角色需要的具体资格
_properties.rdfs:comment: Specific qualifications required for this role.
_properties.rdfs:label: qualifications

_properties.rdfs:comment: Responsibilities associated with this role.
_properties.rdfs:label: responsibilities

_properties.descriptionZh: 发布的职位上，用于描述薪水的货币单位。（使用ISO 4217标准）
_properties.rdfs:comment: The currency (coded using ISO 4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.
_properties.rdfs:label: salaryCurrency

_properties.descriptionZh: 能满足此工作职位的技能要求
_properties.rdfs:comment: Skills required to fulfill this role.
_properties.rdfs:label: skills

_properties.descriptionZh: 与此职位相关的任何特别承诺。有效实体包括退伍军人承诺，军事配偶承诺等。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.
_properties.rdfs:label: specialCommitments

_properties.rdfs:comment: The title of the job.
_properties.rdfs:label: title

_properties.rdfs:comment: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.
_properties.rdfs:label: validThrough

_properties.descriptionZh: 此工作的典型工作时间（例如，第一班，夜班，上午8点至下午5点）
_properties.rdfs:comment: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).
_properties.rdfs:label: workHours

_pTree.descriptionZh: 描述某一组织的空缺职位的启事。
_pTree.rdfs:comment: A listing that describes a job opening in a certain organization.
_pTree.rdfs:label: JobPosting

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

_properties.rdfs:comment: An alias for the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: alternateName

_properties.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: description

_examples.MICRODATA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.
_examples.PRE-MARKUP: George Bush, the 41st President of the United States is the father of George W. Bush, the 43rd President of the United States.
_examples.RDFA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:

This classic banana bread recipe comes from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice

Tags: Low fat

Ingredients:

- 1 egg
- 3/4 cup of sugar
...
Instructions:
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add the
 flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
140 comments:
From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
...

_examples.JSON: This example is in microdata only.
_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

_properties.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
_properties.rdfs:label: image

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: name

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs
